findings.description: The emergencyConfigOverride function on lines 109-112 allows ANY external caller to update the configVersion without any access control restrictions.
findings.reasoning: While the finding is valid, it describes a design choice rather than a vulnerability. The function is intentionally designed to be callable by anyone, as indicated by its name 'emergencyConfigOverride'.

target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The target vulnerability (access_control) was not mentioned in any of the findings.

notes: The audit findings did not identify the target vulnerability (access_control) in the openTroveAndMigrate function. Instead, it identified a design choice in the emergencyConfigOverride function.
